name: django-papaye
description: You write in Python, it compiles in Javascript

scripts.devDesktop: rm -rf .build/ .parcel-cache/ && NODE_ENV=development parcel watch t_logic/main.py --log-level info --no-source-maps --port 8080 --dist-dir static/js
scripts.buildDesktop: rm -rf .build/ .parcel-cache/ && NODE_ENV=production parcel build t_logic/main.py --log-level info --no-source-maps --no-cache --dist-dir static/js
scripts.devMobile: rm -rf .build/ .parcel-cache/ && NODE_ENV=development parcel watch t_logic/main_mobile.py --log-level info --no-source-maps --port 8080 --dist-dir static/js
scripts.buildMobile: rm -rf .build/ .parcel-cache/ && NODE_ENV=production parcel build t_logic/main_mobile.py --log-level info --no-source-maps --no-cache --dist-dir static/js
